attributes.action: Vote of no confidence resulting in the dissolving of parliment
attributes.additional_details: This is for the turning of a new era for Britain. Politicians havee  become greedy, corrupt, and untrust worthy of the brittish public and only intrested in what makes them money and keeps us working class down. now is the time for change we DO NOT want any riots but want to remove the whole of parliment through the act of a vote of no confidence and replace them with a council that consists of working class people.
